name: Crisis Mountain
overview: Crisis Mountain is a classic platform game. Your task is to defuse bombs left by terrorists in mountain caverns when a dormant volcano above starts erupting unexpectedly. Time is limited as the bombs are ticking towards detonation. It contains nine levels of play. The original version was on the Apple II and was developed by David Schroeder. The C64 version was ported by Lloyd Ollmann Jr. for Creative Software, Inc.
